code:
// src/data/menuData.js
export const menuCategories = [{
  "SOUPS & STEWS": {
    "Korean": [{
      "id": "galbitang",
      "koreanName": "갈비탕",

  categories: ["soup", "stew"],
  imageUrl: "/images/menu/budaejjigae.jpg"
}, {

  spicyLevel: 0,

}, {
  id: "naengmyeon",

// Continue with more items...
];

// Also export the utility functions that the error message suggests
export const getMenuItemsByCategory = category => {
  return menuItems.filter(item => item.categories.includes(category));
};
export const getMenuItemsByProtein = protein => {
  return menuItems.filter(item => item.protein === protein);
};
export const getMenuItemsBySpicyLevel = level => {
  return menuItems.filter(item => item.spicyLevel === level);
};

// Helper function to flatten menu for situations where we need a flat list
export const getFlattenedMenu = () => {
  const flattened = [];
  Object.entries(menuCategories).forEach(([mainCategory, subCategories]) => {
    Object.entries(subCategories).forEach(([subCategory, items]) => {
      items.forEach(item => {
        flattened.push({
          ...item,
          mainCategory,
          subCategory
        });
      });
    });
  });
  return flattened;
};
export default menuItems;

sourcesContent:
// src/data/menuData.js
export const menuCategories = [{
    "SOUPS & STEWS": {
        "Korean": [
            {
                "id": "galbitang",
                "koreanName": "갈비탕",
                "romanizedName": "galbi tang",
                "description": "Korean beef short rib soup in clear broth with glass noodles and vegetables",
                "protein": "beef",
                "spicyLevel": 0,
                "categories": ["soup", "noodle"],
                "imageUrl": "/images/menu/galbitang.jpg"
            },
            {
                "id": "sarigomtang",
                "koreanName": "사리곰탕",
                "romanizedName": "sari gomtang",
                "description": "Clear beef bone soup with tender brisket meat",
                "protein": "beef",
                "spicyLevel": 0,
                "categories": ["soup"],
                "imageUrl": "/images/menu/sarigomtang.jpg"
            },
            {
                "id": "kimchijjigae",
                "koreanName": "김치찌개",
                "romanizedName": "kimchi jjigae",
                "description": "Hearty Korean stew made with fermented kimchi and pork",
                "protein": "pork",
                "spicyLevel": 2,
                "categories": ["soup", "stew"],
                "imageUrl": "/images/menu/kimchijjigae.jpg"
            },
            {
                "id": "budaejjigae",
                "koreanName": "부대찌개",
                "romanizedName": "budae jjigae",
                "description": "Spicy Korean stew with kimchi, spam, and noodles",
                "protein": ["spam", "meat mix"],
                "spicyLevel": 2,
                "categories": ["soup", "stew"],
                "imageUrl": "/images/menu/budaejjigae.jpg"
            },

// Also export the utility functions that the error message suggests
export const getMenuItemsByCategory = (category) => {
    return menuItems.filter(item => item.categories.includes(category));
};

export const getMenuItemsByProtein = (protein) => {
    return menuItems.filter(item => item.protein === protein);
};

export const getMenuItemsBySpicyLevel = (level) => {
    return menuItems.filter(item => item.spicyLevel === level);
    };

// Helper function to flatten menu for situations where we need a flat list
export const getFlattenedMenu = () => {
    const flattened = [];
    
    Object.entries(menuCategories).forEach(([mainCategory, subCategories]) => {
      Object.entries(subCategories).forEach(([subCategory, items]) => {
        items.forEach(item => {
          flattened.push({
            ...item,
            mainCategory,
            subCategory
          });
        });
      });
    });
    
    return flattened;
  };

export default menuItems;
